Class ResizeObserver

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.elemento.ResizeObserver
@JsType(isNative=true, namespace="<global>") public class ResizeObserver extends Object
The ResizeObserver interface reports changes to the dimensions of an Element's content or border box.
See Also:
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ResizeObserver
